doc.title: EMBOSS

description.text: European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite

doc.reference: EMBOSS: The European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite (2000) Rice,P. Longden,I. and Bleasby, A. Trends in Genetics 16, (6) pp276--277

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF
EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF
fieldset.legend: Other sequences that the mutated result should not match?

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: If you require that the resulting mutated sequence should not match a set of other sequences, then you can specify that set of sequences here. For example, if you require that the mutated sequence should not be the same as the input sequence, enter the input sequence here. If you want the result to be different to previous results of this program, specify the previous result sequences here. The program will check that the result does not match the sequences specified here before writing it out. If a match is found, then the mutation is started again with a fresh copy of the input sequence. If, after 10 such retries, there is still a match to the set of sequence given here, then the matching mutated sequence is written with a warning message.

xhtml:div.label: Number of times to perform the mutation operations (value greater than or equal to 0)
Point mutation operations (value from 1 to 4) None Any of the following Insertions Deletions Changes Duplications Moves
Block mutation operations (value from 1 to 4) None Any of the following Insertions Deletions Changes Duplications Moves

Codon mutation operations (value from 1 to 4)?
None Any of the following Insertions Deletions Changes Duplications Moves
Types of codon mutations to perform. These are only done if the sequence is nucleic.
Do 'codon' and 'block' operations in frame Yes No
Minimum size for a block mutation (value greater than or equal to 0)
Maximum size for a block mutation
Name of the output sequence file (e_outseq)
Choose the sequence output format Embl Fasta Gcg Genbank Nbrf Codata Raw Swissprot Gff

parameter.name: e_othersequence
parameter.prompt: Other sequences that the mutated result should not match

comment.text: If you require that the resulting mutated sequence should not match a set of other sequences, then you can specify that set of sequences here. For example, if you require that the mutated sequence should not be the same as the input sequence, enter the input sequence here. If you want the result to be different to previous results of this program, specify the previous result sequences here. The program will check that the result does not match the sequences specified here before writing it out. If a match is found, then the mutation is started again with a fresh copy of the input sequence. If, after 10 such retries, there is still a match to the set of sequence given here, then the matching mutated sequence is written with a warning message.

xhtml:fieldset.xhtml:legend: Other sequences that the mutated result should not match

div.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: If you require that the resulting mutated sequence should not match a set of other sequences, then you can specify that set of sequences here. For example, if you require that the mutated sequence should not be the same as the input sequence, enter the input sequence here. If you want the result to be different to previous results of this program, specify the previous result sequences here. The program will check that the result does not match the sequences specified here before writing it out. If a match is found, then the mutation is started again with a fresh copy of the input sequence. If, after 10 such retries, there is still a match to the set of sequence given here, then the matching mutated sequence is written with a warning message.

parameter.name: e_count
parameter.prompt: Number of times to perform the mutation operations (value greater than or equal to 0)

format.code: ("", " -count=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 0 is required
